meanings.definition: One of the front teeth in the upper or lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The foretooth helps in biting into food.
meanings.sent2: She flashed a smile, revealing her shiny foretooth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used its foretooth to nibble on the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His foretooth was as sharp as a dagger, ready to tear through the tough meat.
meanings.sent5: The dentist pointed out the cavity in her foretooth, urging her to brush regularly.

meanings.definition: The tooth located towards the front of the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The foretooth is essential for a bright smile.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sharp pain in his foretooth while biting into an apple.
meanings.sent3: The cat used its foretooth to playfully nibble on the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her foretooth gleamed like a pearl in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The foretooth of the key snapped off, leaving him locked out of the house.
